duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales activities.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, engaging with multiple touch points and ensuring follow-through.
Engage in face-to-face meetings, networking, and portfolio building to promote and sell products and services.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and customer renewals.
Utilize a custom CRM platform for client acquisition and management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or related field (Master's preferred)
